chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_1 pl) (uad_conv_1 a) -> prec_occur pl a

Premises:
upl_conv_1 = fix upl_conv_1 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_1 a) (upl_conv_1 p0) (upl_conv_1 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
uad_conv_1 = fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end : ad -> ad
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
ad = N : Set
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
upl_conv_0_occur : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 pl) (uad_conv_0 a) -> prec_occur pl a
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
union_s0d_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M0 prec_list) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M0 prec_list)) (app c tl)
prec_occur_1 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_occur p2 a
union_s_prd0 = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) s -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl s) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a
union_s_rpl : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
union_s0d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s0d_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c0 : ad) (pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) -> c <> c0 -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c0 pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s_rpl_def = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s (app c tl) : state -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)
u_merge_invr_0_lst : forall (p : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (lt : term_list), liste_reconnait p pl lt -> Prop
u_merge_invr_1_lst : forall (p : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (lt : term_list), liste_reconnait p pl lt -> Prop
u_merge_inv_0_lst : forall (p0 : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (lt : term_list), liste_reconnait p0 pl lt -> Prop
u_merge_inv_1_lst : forall (p1 : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (lt : term_list), liste_reconnait p1 pl lt -> Prop
union_s1d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> a <> c -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
u_conv1_r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (udta_conv_1 p) (uad_conv_1 a) t -> reconnaissance p a t
u_conv1 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> reconnaissance (udta_conv_1 p) (uad_conv_1 a) t
u_merge_5 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_1 a) t -> reconnaissance p1 a t
u_merge_3 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p1 a t -> reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_1 a) t
pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall n : nat, pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 n -> pl_tl_length pl (S n) -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> S n = lst_length tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
u_conv_1_invar_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_1 ladj0
u_conv_1_invar_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj) -> MapGet state d a = Some ladj
u_conv_1_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj)

```coq
intros pl a H.
induction H using prec_occur_ind.
- intros. simpl. constructor.
- intros. simpl. apply prec_int0. apply IHprec_occur.
- intros. simpl. apply prec_int1. apply IHprec_occur.
Qed.
```

original: intros pl a H. induction H using prec_occur_ind. - intros. simpl. constructor. - intros. simpl. apply prec_int0. apply IHprec_occur. - intros. simpl. apply prec_int1. apply IHprec_occur.
